Author: invisiblefatty4003
Text: Well, being vegetarian a lot of the kids & adults won’t know what’s “normal” for you to be eating. As long as it looks like a big amount of food (like a giant greens salad) they won’t think to question it  As for hiding weight loss camp councilors can get by with wearing slightly baggy t-shirts etc.   And you usually will only have them for a few weeks before they l leave. As for coworkers possibly noticing you could always blame it on never being this active in your day to day life   Best of luck & stay safe
